member.summary: Search assets by tags, type, or realm
member.remarks:
Search assets using various filters with pagination.
All filters are optional and combine with AND logic.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.CreateBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create asset bundle from multiple assets
member.remarks:
Create a .bannou bundle containing multiple assets.
For large bundles, processing is delegated to the processing pool.
Completion notification sent via WebSocket event.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.GetBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.GetBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get bundle manifest and download URL
member.remarks:
Retrieve bundle metadata and generate a pre-signed download URL.
Supports both native .bannou format and ZIP conversion (cached).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.RequestBundleUploadAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.BundleUploadRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Request upload URL for a pre-made bundle
member.remarks:
Upload a pre-built bundle (.bannou or .zip format).
After upload, the bundle undergoes validation before registration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.CreateMetabundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateMetabundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Compose a metabundle by extracting and repackaging assets from multiple
source bundles. The resulting metabundle is a complete physical copy with
provenance metadata tracking the source bundles.
Assets are deduplicated by content hash. If the same asset ID exists in
multiple source bundles with different content hashes, the request fails
with conflict details.
member.returns: Metabundle created or queued for creation

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.GetJobStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.GetJobStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Poll the status of an async metabundle creation job.
Use the jobId returned from createMetabundle when status was 'queued'.
Clients can either poll this endpoint or wait for the
MetabundleCreationCompleteEvent via WebSocket for completion notification.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.CancelJobAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CancelJobRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Cancel a pending or processing metabundle creation job.
Jobs that are already completed (ready or failed) cannot be cancelled.
Successfully cancelled jobs will emit a MetabundleCreationCompleteEvent
with status 'cancelled' via WebSocket.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.ResolveBundlesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.ResolveBundlesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Compute optimal bundles for requested assets
member.remarks:
Given a list of asset IDs, compute the optimal set of bundles to download
to obtain all requested assets with minimal transfers.
The algorithm uses greedy set-cover optimization:
1. Find all bundles containing requested assets
2. Select bundles that cover the most uncovered assets
3. Prefer metabundles when coverage is equal (tie-breaker)
4. Include standalone assets for any remaining unresolved IDs
Returns pre-signed download URLs for all selected bundles and assets.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.QueryBundlesByAssetAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.QueryBundlesByAssetRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Find all bundles containing a specific asset
member.remarks:
Query the reverse index to find all bundles (source and metabundle)
that contain a specific asset ID. Useful for understanding asset
distribution and debugging resolution issues.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.UpdateBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.UpdateBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Update metadata for an existing bundle (name, description, tags).
Does not modify bundle contents - for that, create a new bundle.
Increments the bundle version and records the change in version history.
Only the bundle owner or admin can update.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.DeleteBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.DeleteBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Soft-delete a bundle, marking it as deleted but retaining data
for the configured retention period (default 30 days).
Deleted bundles are excluded from resolution and queries by default.
Use permanent=true for immediate, unrecoverable deletion (admin only).
Only the bundle owner or admin can delete.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.RestoreBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.RestoreBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Restore a bundle that was soft-deleted, making it active again.
Can only restore bundles within their retention period.
Only the bundle owner or admin can restore.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.QueryBundlesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.QueryBundlesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Query bundles with flexible filtering options including:
- Tag matching (exact, exists, not exists)
- Status filtering (active, deleted)
- Date range filtering
- Name search (contains)
- Owner filtering
- Realm and bundle type filtering
Supports pagination and sorting.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.ListBundleVersionsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.ListBundleVersionsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List version history for a bundle
member.remarks:
Get the version history for a bundle, showing all metadata changes
over time. Each version record includes:
- Version number
- When the change was made
- Who made the change
- What changed
- Optional reason for the change
The current version's full metadata snapshot is always included.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.BulkGetAssetsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.BulkGetAssetsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Retrieve metadata for multiple assets in a single request.
Optionally includes pre-signed download URLs.
Maximum 100 asset IDs per request.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateMetabundleRequest
member.summary:
Request to create a metabundle from source bundles and/or standalone assets.
At least one of sourceBundleIds or standaloneAssetIds must be provided.
This enables packaging behaviors/scripts with 3D assets as a complete unit.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateMetabundleRequest.MetabundleId
member.summary: Human-readable identifier for the new metabundle (e.g., "game-assets-v1")

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateMetabundleRequest.SourceBundleIds
member.summary:
Human-readable source bundle IDs (e.g., "synty/polygon-adventure") to pull assets from.
Can cherry-pick specific assets using assetFilter, or include all if assetFilter is null.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateMetabundleRequest.StandaloneAssetIds
member.summary:
Individual asset IDs (not in bundles) to include directly.
Useful for including behaviors, scripts, or metadata files
alongside bundled 3D assets.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateMetabundleRequest.Owner
member.summary:
Owner of this metabundle. NOT a session ID.
For user-initiated: the accountId (UUID format).
For service-initiated: the service name.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateMetabundleRequest.AssetFilter
member.summary:
Optional subset of asset IDs to include FROM SOURCE BUNDLES.
If null, all assets from source bundles are included.
Standalone assets are always included regardless of this filter.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateMetabundleResponse
member.summary:
Response from metabundle creation.
For synchronous creation (small jobs): status=ready with downloadUrl.
For async creation (large jobs): status=queued with jobId for polling.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateMetabundleResponse.JobId
member.summary:
Job ID for async processing. Only present when status is 'queued' or 'processing'.
Use /bundles/job/status to poll for completion, or wait for
MetabundleCreationCompleteEvent via WebSocket.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateMetabundleResponse.Status
member.summary:
Creation status.
- queued: Job accepted for async processing (poll with jobId)
- processing: Job is actively running
- ready: Metabundle created and available for download
- failed: Creation failed (see conflicts for details)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateMetabundleResponse.DownloadUrl
member.summary: Pre-signed download URL (only present when status is 'ready')

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateMetabundleResponse.AssetCount
member.summary: Number of assets in the metabundle

member.summary: Number of standalone assets included directly (not from bundles)

member.summary: Present if creation failed due to asset conflicts

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Auth service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.LoginAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.LoginRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.RegisterAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.RegisterRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.InitOAuthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.Provider,System.Uri,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Browser-facing endpoint for initiating OAuth flows. The user's browser navigates
to this URL directly, which then redirects to the OAuth provider.
**Note**: This endpoint uses GET with path parameters because it's a browser
redirect flow, not a WebSocket-routed API call.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.CompleteOAuthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.Provider,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.OAuthCallbackRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Browser-facing callback endpoint for OAuth providers. The OAuth provider redirects
the user's browser back to this URL after authentication.
**Note**: This endpoint uses path parameters because the callback URL is registered
with OAuth providers and cannot be changed without updating provider configurations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.VerifySteamAuthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.SteamVerifyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Validates a Steam Session Ticket obtained from the game client via ISteamUser::GetAuthTicketForWebApi().
The server validates the ticket with Steam's Web API and retrieves the SteamID from Steam's response.
NEVER trust client-provided SteamID - it must come from Steam's authenticated response.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.RefreshTokenAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.RefreshRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.ValidateTokenAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.LogoutAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.LogoutRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.GetSessionsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.TerminateSessionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.TerminateSessionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.GetRevocationListAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.GetRevocationListRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Returns the current list of revoked tokens and accounts for edge provider synchronization
and administrative monitoring. Includes token-level revocations (by JTI) and account-level
revocations (all tokens issued before a timestamp).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.RequestPasswordResetAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.PasswordResetRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: Reset email sent if account exists

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.ConfirmPasswordResetAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.PasswordResetConfirmRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.ListProvidersAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Returns a list of available OAuth and authentication providers based on server configuration.
Providers are only listed if their client credentials are configured.
Steam authentication uses session tickets, not OAuth, but is included for completeness.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.AuthClient.InitOAuthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.Provider,System.Uri,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Browser-facing endpoint for initiating OAuth flows. The user's browser navigates
to this URL directly, which then redirects to the OAuth provider.
**Note**: This endpoint uses GET with path parameters because it's a browser
redirect flow, not a WebSocket-routed API call.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.AuthClient.CompleteOAuthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.Provider,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.OAuthCallbackRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Browser-facing callback endpoint for OAuth providers. The OAuth provider redirects
the user's browser back to this URL after authentication.
**Note**: This endpoint uses path parameters because the callback URL is registered
with OAuth providers and cannot be changed without updating provider configurations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.AuthClient.VerifySteamAuthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.SteamVerifyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Validates a Steam Session Ticket obtained from the game client via ISteamUser::GetAuthTicketForWebApi().
The server validates the ticket with Steam's Web API and retrieves the SteamID from Steam's response.
NEVER trust client-provided SteamID - it must come from Steam's authenticated response.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.AuthClient.GetRevocationListAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.GetRevocationListRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Returns the current list of revoked tokens and accounts for edge provider synchronization
and administrative monitoring. Includes token-level revocations (by JTI) and account-level
revocations (all tokens issued before a timestamp).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.AuthClient.ListProvidersAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Returns a list of available OAuth and authentication providers based on server configuration.
Providers are only listed if their client credentials are configured.
Steam authentication uses session tickets, not OAuth, but is included for completeness.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.SteamVerifyRequest
member.summary:
Request to verify a Steam Session Ticket. The ticket is obtained client-side via
ISteamUser::GetAuthTicketForWebApi("bannou"). SteamID is NOT included because
it must be obtained from Steam's Web API response (never trust client-provided SteamID).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.SteamVerifyRequest.Ticket
member.summary:
Hex-encoded Steam Session Ticket from ISteamUser::GetAuthTicketForWebApi().
Client converts ticket bytes to hex string: BitConverter.ToString(ticketData).Replace("-", "")

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.ICharacterClient.GetEnrichedCharacterAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.GetEnrichedCharacterRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get character with optional related data (personality, backstory, family)
member.remarks:
Retrieves a character with optional include flags for related data.
Use this endpoint when you need aggregated character data from multiple services.
Each included dataset is fetched from its respective service.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.ICharacterClient.CompressCharacterAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.CompressCharacterRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Compress a dead character to archive format
member.remarks:
Compresses a dead character's data for long-term storage.
Generates text summaries of personality, backstory, and relationships.
After compression, detailed data can be deleted to save storage.
Only works on characters with status 'dead'.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.ICharacterClient.GetCharacterArchiveAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.GetCharacterArchiveRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get compressed archive data for a character

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.ICharacterClient.CheckCharacterReferencesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.CheckReferencesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check reference count for cleanup eligibility
member.remarks:
Returns the current reference count for a compressed character.
Characters with refCount=0 for the grace period are eligible for deletion.
References include: family relationships, past lives, historical events, memories.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.ICharacterClient.GetCharactersByRealmAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.GetCharactersByRealmRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get all characters in a realm (primary query pattern)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.ICharacterClient.TransferCharacterToRealmAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.TransferCharacterToRealmRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Transfer character to a different realm
member.remarks:
Moves a character from their current realm to a new target realm.
Updates all indexes, validates the target realm exists and is active,
and publishes realm transition events.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.CharacterArchive
member.summary:
Compressed archive of a dead character.
Contains text summaries instead of structured data for long-term storage.
Self-contained with no external references (suitable for cleanup).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.CharacterArchive.PersonalitySummary
member.summary:
Text summary of personality traits.
Example: "Brave and loyal, somewhat hot-tempered with a strong sense of justice"

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.CharacterArchive.KeyBackstoryPoints
member.summary:
Key backstory elements as text.
Example: ["Trained by the Knights Guild", "Born in the Northlands"]

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.CharacterArchive.MajorLifeEvents
member.summary:
Significant life events as text.
Example: ["Fought in the Battle of Stormgate (Hero)", "Survived the Great Flood"]

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.CharacterArchive.FamilySummary
member.summary:
Text summary of family relationships.
Example: "Father of 3, married to Elena, orphaned at young age"

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient
member.summary: Client interface for the CharacterEncounter service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.CreateEncounterTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.CreateEncounterTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates a new encounter type code for game-specific encounter categories.
Built-in types (COMBAT, TRADE, etc.) cannot be created via this endpoint.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Retrieve an encounter type by its unique code.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.ListEncounterTypesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ListEncounterTypesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Retrieve all encounter types including built-in and custom types.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.UpdateEncounterTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.UpdateEncounterTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Update an existing encounter type. Built-in types can only have their
description and defaultEmotionalImpact updated.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.DeleteEncounterTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.DeleteEncounterTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Delete a custom encounter type. Built-in types cannot be deleted.
Types with existing encounters cannot be deleted.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.SeedEncounterTypesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.SeedEncounterTypesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Idempotent operation to seed built-in encounter types. Called automatically
at service startup, but can be invoked manually to restore defaults.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.RecordEncounterAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.RecordEncounterRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Records a new encounter between two or more characters. Creates the shared
encounter record and individual perspectives for each participant.
Perspectives can be provided in the request or will be auto-generated with
default values if not specified.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.QueryByCharacterAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.QueryByCharacterRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Retrieves all encounters for a character with optional filtering.
Memory decay is applied lazily on access.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.QueryBetweenAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.QueryBetweenRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Retrieves all encounters between two specific characters.
Useful for relationship history and dialogue context.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.QueryByLocationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.QueryByLocationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Retrieves recent encounters at a specific location.
Useful for scene context and area history.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.HasMetAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.HasMetRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Quick check if two characters have met
member.remarks:
Fast boolean check for whether two characters have any recorded encounters.
Does not apply memory decay or return encounter details.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.GetSentimentAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.GetSentimentRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Calculates the aggregate sentiment a character has toward another based
on all their encounters. Memory strength is factored into the calculation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.BatchGetSentimentAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.BatchGetSentimentRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Calculates sentiment toward multiple target characters in a single call.
Efficient for behavior system queries that check multiple NPCs.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.GetPerspectiveAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.GetPerspectiveRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Retrieves a specific character's perspective on an encounter.
Includes emotional impact, sentiment shift, and memory strength.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.UpdatePerspectiveAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.UpdatePerspectiveRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Updates a character's perspective on an encounter. Used when a character
reflects on past events or gains new information about an encounter.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.RefreshMemoryAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.RefreshMemoryRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Strengthens a character's memory of an encounter. Called when the encounter
is referenced in dialogue, thought, or action. Counteracts memory decay.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.DeleteEncounterAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.DeleteEncounterRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Deletes an encounter record and all associated perspectives.
This is a hard delete and cannot be undone.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.DeleteByCharacterAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.DeleteByCharacterRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Delete all encounters for a character
member.remarks:
Deletes all encounter records and perspectives involving a specific character.
Used during character deletion or compression. This is a hard delete.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.ICharacterEncounterClient.DecayMemoriesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterEncounter.DecayMemoriesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Manually triggers memory decay processing for all or specific characters.
Normally decay is applied lazily on access, but this can be used for
maintenance or testing purposes.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.ICharacterHistoryClient
member.summary: Client interface for the CharacterHistory service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.ICharacterHistoryClient.RecordParticipationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.RecordParticipationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Record character participation in a historical event
member.remarks:
Records that a character participated in a historical event. Events are
identified by eventId (typically managed by a game-specific event system).
The significance rating affects how strongly this event influences behavior.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.ICharacterHistoryClient.GetParticipationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.GetParticipationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get all historical events a character participated in
member.remarks:
Retrieves all historical event participation records for a character.
Supports filtering by event category and minimum significance.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.ICharacterHistoryClient.GetEventParticipantsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.GetEventParticipantsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get all characters who participated in a historical event
member.remarks:
Retrieves all characters who participated in a specific historical event.
Useful for generating event summaries or finding related characters.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.ICharacterHistoryClient.DeleteParticipationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.DeleteParticipationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Removes a specific participation record. Used during character compression
or to correct erroneous records.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.ICharacterHistoryClient.GetBackstoryAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.GetBackstoryRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get machine-readable backstory elements for behavior system
member.remarks:
Retrieves structured backstory elements for a character. These elements
are machine-readable key-value pairs used by the behavior system for
decision-making, not narrative text for players.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.ICharacterHistoryClient.SetBackstoryAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.SetBackstoryRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Set backstory elements for a character
member.remarks:
Creates or updates backstory elements for a character. Can either replace
all existing elements or merge with them based on the replaceExisting flag.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.ICharacterHistoryClient.AddBackstoryElementAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.AddBackstoryElementRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Adds a single backstory element to a character's existing backstory.
If an element with the same type and key exists, it will be updated.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.ICharacterHistoryClient.DeleteBackstoryAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.DeleteBackstoryRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Delete all backstory for a character
member.remarks:
Removes all backstory elements for a character. Used during character
compression or deletion.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.ICharacterHistoryClient.DeleteAllHistoryAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.DeleteAllHistoryRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Delete all history data for a character
member.remarks:
Removes all history data (participation records and backstory) for a
character. Used during character compression after summarization.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.ICharacterHistoryClient.SummarizeHistoryAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterHistory.SummarizeHistoryRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Generate text summaries for character compression
member.remarks:
Generates text summaries of a character's backstory and historical
participation for inclusion in the CharacterArchive. Called during
character compression before history data is deleted.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create or update personality for a character

Creates or replaces the personality profile for a character. If a personality
already exists, it will be completely replaced (not merged).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.ICharacterPersonalityClient.RecordExperienceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.RecordExperienceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Record an experience that may evolve personality
member.remarks:
Records a significant experience for a character. The system evaluates whether
the experience causes trait evolution based on:
- Experience type and its typical trait impacts
- Experience intensity (higher = more likely to cause change)
- Current trait values and resistance
- Random factor for rarity (most experiences don't cause changes)
This endpoint is typically called by the behavior service when significant
events occur during gameplay.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.ICharacterPersonalityClient.BatchGetPersonalitiesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.BatchGetPersonalitiesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Bulk load personalities for multiple characters. Used by the behavior service
for efficient region initialization. Characters without personalities are
returned in the notFound array.
Maximum 100 characters per request.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Removes the personality profile for a character. Typically called during
character compression or deletion.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Connect service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.ProxyInternalRequestAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.InternalProxyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Internal API proxy for stateless requests
member.remarks:
Stateless HTTP proxy for internal requests that don't require persistent sessions.
Applies permission validation and rate limiting based on agent role and context.
Perfect for AI agents making one-off API calls or bulk operations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.GetClientCapabilitiesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.GetClientCapabilitiesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get client capability manifest (GUID API mappings)
member.remarks:
Returns the capability manifest for the authenticated client's session.
Maps client-salted GUIDs to available API endpoints based on the client's
current permissions and session state.
**Security**: Each client receives unique GUIDs for the same API endpoints.
This prevents cross-session exploitation and enables per-client rate limiting.
**Dynamic Updates**: Capabilities may change during a session when:
- Role changes occur (admin promotion, etc.)
- Subscription status changes
- Session state transitions
Clients should listen for capability update events via WebSocket to stay current.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.ConnectWebSocketAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Connection,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Upgrade,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Initiates a WebSocket connection for real-time communication.
Requires JWT authentication via Authorization header.
**Connection Flow:**
1. Send HTTP GET request with `Connection: Upgrade` and `Upgrade: websocket` headers
2. Include `Authorization: Bearer <jwt_token>` header for authentication
3. Server validates JWT and extracts user claims (roles, scopes, services)
4. Connection upgrades to WebSocket protocol
5. Client can send binary messages using the custom protocol
**Reconnection:**
For existing sessions, use `Authorization: Reconnect <reconnect_token>` instead.
member.param: Must be "Upgrade" to initiate WebSocket connection
Must be "websocket" to specify protocol upgrade

JWT Bearer token for new connections: "Bearer <jwt_token>"
Reconnect token for existing sessions: "Reconnect <reconnect_token>"

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.ConnectWebSocketPostAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Connection2,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Upgrade2,System.String,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ConnectRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Alternative POST method for establishing WebSocket connections.
Functionally identical to the GET method but supports clients that
require POST for WebSocket upgrades.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.GetAccountSessionsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.GetAccountSessionsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get all active WebSocket sessions for an account
member.remarks:
Returns all active WebSocket session IDs for a specified account.
This is an internal endpoint used by services that need to know which
sessions are currently connected for a given account.
**Use Cases:**
- GameSessionService periodic cache sync
- Service-to-service session discovery
- Admin session management
**Note:** Session IDs returned are those with active WebSocket connections.
Sessions in reconnection windows may not appear in this list.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Internal API proxy for stateless requests
member.remarks:
Stateless HTTP proxy for internal requests that don't require persistent sessions.
Applies permission validation and rate limiting based on agent role and context.
Perfect for AI agents making one-off API calls or bulk operations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ConnectClient.GetClientCapabilitiesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.GetClientCapabilitiesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get client capability manifest (GUID API mappings)
member.remarks:
Returns the capability manifest for the authenticated client's session.
Maps client-salted GUIDs to available API endpoints based on the client's
current permissions and session state.
**Security**: Each client receives unique GUIDs for the same API endpoints.
This prevents cross-session exploitation and enables per-client rate limiting.
**Dynamic Updates**: Capabilities may change during a session when:
- Role changes occur (admin promotion, etc.)
- Subscription status changes
- Session state transitions
Clients should listen for capability update events via WebSocket to stay current.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ConnectClient.ConnectWebSocketAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Connection,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Upgrade,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Initiates a WebSocket connection for real-time communication.
Requires JWT authentication via Authorization header.
**Connection Flow:**
1. Send HTTP GET request with `Connection: Upgrade` and `Upgrade: websocket` headers
2. Include `Authorization: Bearer <jwt_token>` header for authentication
3. Server validates JWT and extracts user claims (roles, scopes, services)
4. Connection upgrades to WebSocket protocol
5. Client can send binary messages using the custom protocol
**Reconnection:**
For existing sessions, use `Authorization: Reconnect <reconnect_token>` instead.
member.param: Must be "Upgrade" to initiate WebSocket connection
Must be "websocket" to specify protocol upgrade

JWT Bearer token for new connections: "Bearer <jwt_token>"
Reconnect token for existing sessions: "Reconnect <reconnect_token>"

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ConnectClient.ConnectWebSocketPostAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Connection2,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Upgrade2,System.String,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ConnectRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Alternative POST method for establishing WebSocket connections.
Functionally identical to the GET method but supports clients that
require POST for WebSocket upgrades.

member.summary: Get all active WebSocket sessions for an account
member.remarks:
Returns all active WebSocket session IDs for a specified account.
This is an internal endpoint used by services that need to know which
sessions are currently connected for a given account.
**Use Cases:**
- GameSessionService periodic cache sync
- Service-to-service session discovery
- Admin session management
**Note:** Session IDs returned are those with active WebSocket connections.
Sessions in reconnection windows may not appear in this list.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ConnectRequest
member.summary:
Request model for WebSocket connection establishment.
Currently contains no specific fields but extends the base ApiRequest.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ResponseCodes
member.summary:
Response codes used in the binary protocol for success/error indication.
Provides fine-grained error reporting for different failure scenarios.
**Request error codes (10-19):**
- 10 (RequestError): Generic malformed request
- 11 (RequestTooLarge): Payload exceeds maximum size
- 12 (TooManyRequests): Rate limit exceeded
- 13 (InvalidRequestChannel): Invalid channel number
- 14 (TextProtocolNotSupported): Text WebSocket frames are not supported; use binary protocol
**Broadcast error codes (40-49):**
- 40 (BroadcastNotAllowed): Broadcast attempted in External mode where it is forbidden
**Shortcut-specific error codes (70-79):**
- 70 (ShortcutExpired): Session shortcut has expired (TTL exceeded)
- 71 (ShortcutTargetNotFound): Shortcut's target capability no longer available
- 72 (ShortcutRevoked): Session shortcut was explicitly revoked

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage
member.summary:
Structure of a service request message in the enhanced 31-byte binary protocol.
This schema is for documentation - actual messages are binary.
**Binary Header Layout (31 bytes):**
- Bytes 0: Message Flags (1 byte)
- Bytes 1-2: Channel ID (2 bytes, big-endian)
- Bytes 3-6: Sequence Number (4 bytes, big-endian)
- Bytes 7-22: Service GUID (16 bytes)
- Bytes 23-30: Message ID (8 bytes)
- Bytes 31+: Payload (variable length)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.Flags
member.summary: Bit flags controlling message behavior (binary, encrypted, compressed, etc.)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.Channel
member.summary: Channel for sequential message processing (0-65535, 0 = default)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.SequenceNumber
member.summary: Per-channel sequence number for message ordering

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.MessageId
member.summary: Unique message ID for request/response correlation

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.Payload
member.summary: Message payload (JSON or binary data based on flags)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceResponseMessage
member.summary:
Structure of a service response message in the enhanced 31-byte binary protocol.
This schema is for documentation - actual messages are binary.
**Binary Header Layout (31 bytes):**
- Same as ServiceRequestMessage but with Response flag (0x40) set

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceResponseMessage.ResponseCode
member.summary: Response status code indicating success or specific error condition

Locks a contract under guardian custody (e.g., escrow). A locked contract
cannot be modified, terminated, or have parties transferred except by the
guardian. Requires the contract template to have `transferable: true`.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.IContractClient.UnlockContractAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.UnlockContractRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Unlocks a contract from guardian custody. Only the current guardian can
unlock a contract. Called on escrow refund to restore contract to original state.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.IContractClient.TransferContractPartyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.TransferContractPartyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Transfer party role to new entity
member.remarks:
Transfers a party role to a new entity. Used by escrow to reassign contract
roles on release (e.g., transfer landlord role to new property owner).
Contract must be locked and caller must be the guardian.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.IContractClient.RegisterClauseTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.RegisterClauseTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Registers a new clause type with validation and/or execution handlers.
Clause types are registered globally (plugin-level, admin operation) and
referenced by contract templates via typeCode. Built-in types
(asset_requirement, currency_transfer, item_transfer) are pre-registered.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.IContractClient.ListClauseTypesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.ListClauseTypesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Lists all registered clause types including built-in types and
custom-registered types.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.IContractClient.SetContractTemplateValuesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.SetTemplateValuesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Set template values on contract instance
member.remarks:
Sets template values on a contract instance. Called by escrow when binding
a contract to an escrow agreement. Template values are used for variable
substitution in clause handlers (e.g., wallet IDs, container IDs).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.IContractClient.CheckAssetRequirementsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.CheckAssetRequirementsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if asset requirement clauses are satisfied
member.remarks:
Checks if all asset requirement clauses are satisfied. Uses template values
(e.g., PartyA_EscrowWalletId) to query actual balances in escrow wallets/containers
via the registered clause type handlers.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.IContractClient.ExecuteContractAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.ExecuteContractRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Executes all contract distribution clauses - distribute assets per clauses,
collect fees, mark contract as executed. This is idempotent - calling twice
returns the same result without re-executing. Contract must be in fulfilled
status and all template values must be set.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.AssetType
member.summary:
Type of asset held in escrow.
- currency: Currency amount held in escrow wallet
- item: Item instance held in escrow container
- item_stack: Stackable items (quantity) held in escrow container
- contract: Contract instance locked under escrow guardianship
- custom: Custom asset type via registered handler

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Currency service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.CreateCurrencyDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CreateCurrencyDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates a new currency type with its behavior rules. Code, precision, and scope
are immutable after creation. Only one base currency per scope is allowed.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetCurrencyDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetCurrencyDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get currency definition by ID or code
member.remarks:
Retrieves a currency definition by its unique ID or code.
At least one of definitionId or code must be provided.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.ListCurrencyDefinitionsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ListCurrencyDefinitionsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Lists currency definitions with optional filtering by realm, scope,
active status, and base currency flag.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.UpdateCurrencyDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.UpdateCurrencyDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update mutable fields of a currency definition
member.remarks:
Updates mutable fields of a currency definition. Code, precision, and scope
are immutable after creation and cannot be changed.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.CreateWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CreateWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create a new wallet for an owner
member.remarks:
Creates a new wallet for a polymorphic owner (account, character, NPC, guild, etc.).
Each owner+ownerType+realm combination can have at most one wallet.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get wallet by ID or owner
member.remarks:
Retrieves a wallet by its ID, or by owner+ownerType+realm combination.
Returns the wallet with all non-zero balances.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetOrCreateWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetOrCreateWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get existing wallet or create if not exists
member.remarks:
Retrieves a wallet if it exists, otherwise creates a new one.
Upsert pattern for convenience.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.FreezeWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.FreezeWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Freeze a wallet to prevent transactions
member.remarks:
Freezes a wallet, preventing all transactions. The reason is recorded
for audit purposes. Frozen wallets can still be queried.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.UnfreezeWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.UnfreezeWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Restores a frozen wallet to active status, allowing transactions again.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.CloseWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CloseWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Permanently closes a wallet and transfers any remaining balances to a
destination wallet. Closed wallets cannot be reopened.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetBalanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetBalanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get balance for a specific currency in a wallet
member.remarks:
Retrieves the current balance for a specific currency in a wallet.
In lazy autogain mode, this may trigger autogain calculation and emit events.
Returns earn cap info and autogain info when applicable.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.BatchGetBalancesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.BatchGetBalancesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get multiple balances in one call
member.remarks:
Retrieves balances for multiple wallet+currency combinations.
Autogain is applied where applicable.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.CreditCurrencyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CreditCurrencyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Credit currency to a wallet (faucet operation)
member.remarks:
Credits currency to a wallet. This is a faucet operation (currency enters the system).
Enforces earn caps, wallet caps, and global supply caps. Requires idempotency key.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.DebitCurrencyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.DebitCurrencyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Debit currency from a wallet (sink operation)
member.remarks:
Debits currency from a wallet. This is a sink operation (currency exits the system).
Checks for sufficient funds unless negative balance is allowed.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.TransferCurrencyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.TransferCurrencyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Transfers currency from one wallet to another. Validates transferability,
realm compatibility, and sufficient funds.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.BatchCreditCurrencyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.BatchCreditRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Credit multiple wallets in one call
member.remarks:
Credits currency to multiple wallets in one call. Each operation is independent;
failures do not rollback others. For atomic multi-wallet operations, use lib-escrow.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.CalculateConversionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CalculateConversionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Previews a currency conversion calculation without executing it.
Uses base currency exchange rates to compute the effective rate.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.ExecuteConversionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ExecuteConversionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Execute currency conversion in a wallet
member.remarks:
Executes a currency conversion within a single wallet. Debits the source
currency and credits the target currency at the computed exchange rate.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetExchangeRateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetExchangeRateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get exchange rate between two currencies
member.remarks:
Retrieves the exchange rate between two currencies using the base currency
as an intermediary.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.UpdateExchangeRateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.UpdateExchangeRateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update a currency's exchange rate to base
member.remarks:
Updates the exchange rate of a currency relative to the base currency.
Cannot set rate on the base currency itself.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetTransactionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetTransactionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Retrieves a single transaction record by its unique ID.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetTransactionHistoryAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetTransactionHistoryRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get paginated transaction history for a wallet
member.remarks:
Retrieves transaction history for a wallet with optional filters
by currency, transaction type, and date range.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetTransactionsByReferenceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetTransactionsByReferenceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get transactions by reference type and ID
member.remarks:
Retrieves all transactions linked to a specific reference (quest, auction,
escrow, etc.).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetGlobalSupplyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetGlobalSupplyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get global supply statistics for a currency
member.remarks:
Returns aggregate supply statistics including total supply, circulation,
escrow amounts, and lifetime mint/burn totals.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetWalletDistributionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetWalletDistributionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Returns wealth distribution statistics including percentiles and
Gini coefficient for a specific currency.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.EscrowDepositAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.EscrowDepositRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Called by lib-escrow when a party deposits currency into an escrow agreement.
Immediately debits the wallet (no lock tracking needed - escrow owns the funds).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.EscrowReleaseAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.EscrowReleaseRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Called by lib-escrow when an escrow agreement completes successfully.
Credits the recipient wallet with the released funds.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.EscrowRefundAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.EscrowRefundRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Called by lib-escrow when an escrow agreement is cancelled or refunded.
Credits the original depositor wallet with the refunded funds.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.CreateHoldAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CreateHoldRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates an authorization hold that reserves funds without debiting.
The held amount reduces the effective balance but does not leave the wallet.
Used for pre-auth scenarios (dining, gas, hotels) where final amount may differ.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.CaptureHoldAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CaptureHoldRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Captures an active hold by debiting the final amount (which may be less than
or equal to the held amount). Any difference is released back to available balance.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.ReleaseHoldAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ReleaseHoldRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Releases an active hold, making all held funds available again.
No debit occurs.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetHoldAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetHoldRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Retrieves the current status and details of an authorization hold.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.EscrowDepositAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.EscrowDepositRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Called by lib-escrow when a party deposits currency into an escrow agreement.
Immediately debits the wallet (no lock tracking needed - escrow owns the funds).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.EscrowReleaseAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.EscrowReleaseRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Called by lib-escrow when an escrow agreement completes successfully.
Credits the recipient wallet with the released funds.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.EscrowRefundAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.EscrowRefundRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Called by lib-escrow when an escrow agreement is cancelled or refunded.
Credits the original depositor wallet with the refunded funds.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.CreateHoldAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CreateHoldRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates an authorization hold that reserves funds without debiting.
The held amount reduces the effective balance but does not leave the wallet.
Used for pre-auth scenarios (dining, gas, hotels) where final amount may differ.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.CaptureHoldAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CaptureHoldRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Captures an active hold by debiting the final amount (which may be less than
or equal to the held amount). Any difference is released back to available balance.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.ReleaseHoldAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ReleaseHoldRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Releases an active hold, making all held funds available again.
No debit occurs.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.GetHoldAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetHoldRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Retrieves the current status and details of an authorization hold.
