member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Escrow service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient.CreateEscrowAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.CreateEscrowRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Create a new escrow agreement. For each party, creates a dedicated escrow wallet
and container (owned by escrow entity). Issues deposit tokens and returns ALL
tokens to the creating service, which is responsible for distributing them to
parties through appropriate channels. Sets template values on bound contract.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient.GetEscrowAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.GetEscrowRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Get escrow agreement details by ID.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient.ListEscrowsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.ListEscrowsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: List escrow agreements with filtering options.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient.GetMyTokenAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.GetMyTokenRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get deposit or release token for a party
member.remarks:
Get the deposit or release token for a specific party. Internal-only endpoint
accessed via Shortcut APIs (prebound). Direct user access is prohibited to prevent
token snooping. The party is identified by ownerId/ownerType (works for characters,
NPCs, guilds, etc.).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient.DepositAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.DepositRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Deposit assets into escrow. Transfers currency from party's own wallet to that
party's escrow wallet. Moves items from party's own container to that party's
escrow container. Locks contracts with escrow as guardian.
Rejects soulbound/non-tradeable items. After each deposit, queries bound contract
to check if all asset requirements are satisfied.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient.ValidateDepositAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.ValidateDepositRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Validate a deposit without executing (dry run).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient.GetDepositStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.GetDepositStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get deposit status for a party
member.remarks: Get deposit status for a party in an escrow.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient.RecordConsentAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.ConsentRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Record party consent for release, refund, or re-affirmation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient.GetConsentStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.GetConsentStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Get consent status for all parties in an escrow.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient.ReleaseAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.ReleaseRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Trigger release (for trusted modes or after consent).
If boundContractId is set, checks contract status first (must be fulfilled).
Runs finalization flow before releasing remaining assets.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient.RefundAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.RefundRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Trigger refund (for trusted modes or consent).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient.CancelAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.CancelRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Cancel escrow before fully funded, refunding any deposits.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient.DisputeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.DisputeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Raise a dispute on funded escrow
member.remarks: Raise a dispute on a funded escrow.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient.ConfirmReleaseAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.ConfirmReleaseRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Called by parties to confirm they received their released assets.
Required when ReleaseMode is party_required or service_and_party.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient.ConfirmRefundAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.ConfirmRefundRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:

Required when RefundMode is party_required.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Arbiter resolves a disputed escrow.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowClient.CreateEscrowAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.CreateEscrowRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Create a new escrow agreement. For each party, creates a dedicated escrow wallet
and container (owned by escrow entity). Issues deposit tokens and returns ALL
tokens to the creating service, which is responsible for distributing them to
parties through appropriate channels. Sets template values on bound contract.

member.remarks: Get escrow agreement details by ID.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowClient.ListEscrowsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.ListEscrowsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: List escrow agreements with filtering options.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowClient.GetMyTokenAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.GetMyTokenRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get deposit or release token for a party
member.remarks:
Get the deposit or release token for a specific party. Internal-only endpoint
accessed via Shortcut APIs (prebound). Direct user access is prohibited to prevent
token snooping. The party is identified by ownerId/ownerType (works for characters,
NPCs, guilds, etc.).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowClient.DepositAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.DepositRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Deposit assets into escrow. Transfers currency from party's own wallet to that
party's escrow wallet. Moves items from party's own container to that party's
escrow container. Locks contracts with escrow as guardian.
Rejects soulbound/non-tradeable items. After each deposit, queries bound contract
to check if all asset requirements are satisfied.

member.remarks: Validate a deposit without executing (dry run).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowType
member.summary:
Type of escrow agreement.
- two_party: Simple trade escrow between Party A and Party B
- multi_party: N parties with complex deposit/receive rules
- conditional: Release based on external condition or contract fulfillment
- auction: Winner-takes-all with refunds to losers

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowStatus
member.summary:
Current status of the escrow agreement.
- pending_deposits: Waiting for parties to deposit
- partially_funded: Some but not all deposits received
- funded: All deposits received, awaiting consent/condition
- pending_consent: Some consents received, waiting for more
- pending_condition: Waiting for contract fulfillment or external verification
- finalizing: Running contract finalizer prebound APIs (transient)
- releasing: Release in progress (transient)
- released: Assets transferred to recipients
- refunding: Refund in progress (transient)
- refunded: Assets returned to depositors
- disputed: In dispute, arbiter must resolve
- expired: Timed out without completion
- cancelled: Cancelled before funding complete
- validation_failed: Held assets changed, awaiting re-affirmation

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowTrustMode
member.summary:
Trust model for the escrow agreement.
- full_consent: All parties must explicitly consent using tokens
- initiator_trusted: The service that created the escrow can complete unilaterally
- single_party_trusted: A designated party can complete unilaterally

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowPartyRole
member.summary:
Role of a party in the escrow.
- depositor: Deposits assets into escrow
- recipient: Receives assets when released
- depositor_recipient: Both deposits and can receive (typical for trades)
- arbiter: Can resolve disputes, does not deposit or receive
- observer: Can view status but cannot act

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowConsentType
member.summary:
Type of consent being given.
- release: Agrees to release assets to recipients
- refund: Agrees to refund assets to depositors
- dispute: Raises a dispute
- reaffirm: Re-affirms after validation failure

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowResolution
member.summary:
How the escrow was resolved.
- released: Assets went to designated recipients
- refunded: Assets returned to depositors
- split: Arbiter split assets between parties
- expired_refunded: Timed out, auto-refunded
- cancelled_refunded: Cancelled, deposits refunded
- violation_refunded: Validation failure caused refund

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.AssetType
member.summary:
Type of asset held in escrow.
- currency: Currency amount held in escrow wallet
- item: Item instance held in escrow container
- item_stack: Stackable items (quantity) held in escrow container
- contract: Contract instance locked under escrow guardianship
- custom: Custom asset type via registered handler

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.ValidationFailureType
member.summary:
Type of validation failure detected.
- asset_missing: Asset no longer exists in escrow custody
- asset_mutated: Asset properties changed (e.g., item durability)
- asset_expired: Asset has a time-based expiration that triggered
- balance_mismatch: Wallet balance does not match expected held amount

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.TokenAlgorithm
member.summary:
Algorithm used for token generation.
- hmac_sha256: HMAC-SHA256 based tokens
- random_bytes: Cryptographically random tokens

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.TokenType
member.summary:
Type of token being requested.
- deposit: Token for depositing assets
- release: Token for consenting to release

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.ReleaseMode
member.summary:
Controls how release confirmation is handled:
- immediate: Finalizing Released (skip Releasing state entirely).
WARNING: Use only for trusted/low-value scenarios (NPC vendors, system rewards).
Assets are marked as released BEFORE downstream services confirm transfers.
If downstream services fail, manual intervention may be required.
- service_only: Wait for downstream services (currency, inventory) to confirm transfers complete.
- party_required: Wait for all parties to call /confirm-release.
- service_and_party: Wait for both service completion AND party confirmation.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.RefundMode
member.summary:
Controls how refund confirmation is handled. Same semantics as ReleaseMode.
Refunds typically use 'immediate' since parties get their own assets back.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.ConfirmationTimeoutBehavior
member.summary:
What happens when confirmation timeout expires:
- auto_confirm: If service events received, auto-confirm parties (default).
- dispute: Transition to Disputed state, require arbiter intervention.
- refund: Treat as failed, transition to Refunding.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.IGameSessionClient.GetGameSessionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.GetGameSessionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Get details of the current game session the user has joined.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.IGameSessionClient.JoinGameSessionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.JoinGameSessionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Join an existing game session. This endpoint is not directly accessible via WebSocket API.
Access is granted through session shortcuts published by the game-session service when
a subscribed user connects. The shortcut contains a pre-bound JoinGameSessionRequest
with the target session ID already filled in.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Kick player from game session (admin only)

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Send chat message to game session

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.IGameSessionClient.PerformGameActionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.GameActionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Perform game action (enhanced permissions after joining)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.IGameSessionClient.JoinGameSessionByIdAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.JoinGameSessionByIdRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Join a specific game session by ID
member.remarks:
Join a game session by its session ID. Used for matchmade games where the session
is pre-created by the matchmaking service and the player has a reservation.
For matchmade sessions, a valid reservation token is required.
For lobby sessions, this allows joining by ID without going through gameType lookup.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.IGameSessionClient.LeaveGameSessionByIdAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.LeaveGameSessionByIdRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Leave a specific game session by ID
member.remarks:
Leave a game session by its session ID. This is the session-specific alternative
to /sessions/leave which uses gameType. Useful for matchmade sessions.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.IGameSessionClient.PublishJoinShortcutAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.PublishJoinShortcutRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Publish join shortcut for matchmade session
member.remarks:
Internal endpoint for the matchmaking service to trigger shortcut publishing
to a specific player for a matchmade session. The shortcut allows the player
to join the session with their reservation token pre-bound.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Join an existing game session. This endpoint is not directly accessible via WebSocket API.

a subscribed user connects. The shortcut contains a pre-bound JoinGameSessionRequest
with the target session ID already filled in.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.GameSessionClient.JoinGameSessionByIdAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.JoinGameSessionByIdRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Join a specific game session by ID
member.remarks:
Join a game session by its session ID. Used for matchmade games where the session
is pre-created by the matchmaking service and the player has a reservation.
For matchmade sessions, a valid reservation token is required.
For lobby sessions, this allows joining by ID without going through gameType lookup.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.GameSessionClient.LeaveGameSessionByIdAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.LeaveGameSessionByIdRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Leave a specific game session by ID
member.remarks:
Leave a game session by its session ID. This is the session-specific alternative
to /sessions/leave which uses gameType. Useful for matchmade sessions.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.GameSessionClient.PublishJoinShortcutAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.PublishJoinShortcutRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Publish join shortcut for matchmade session
member.remarks:
Internal endpoint for the matchmaking service to trigger shortcut publishing
to a specific player for a matchmade session. The shortcut allows the player
to join the session with their reservation token pre-bound.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.VoiceConnectionInfo
member.summary:
Minimal voice metadata returned when joining a session.
**Event-Only Pattern**: Peer connection details are NOT included here.
Clients receive VoicePeerJoinedEvent when other peers join (with their SDP offers).
This avoids race conditions between response processing and event handling.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Inventory service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.CreateContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.CreateContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates a new container with the specified constraint model and capacity.
Container types are game-defined strings (e.g., "inventory", "bank", "equipment_slot").

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.GetContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.GetContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Retrieves a container by ID, optionally including its contents.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.GetOrCreateContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.GetOrCreateContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get container or create if not exists
member.remarks:
Enables lazy container creation for character inventories.
If a container doesn't exist for the owner/type combination, creates it
with the specified defaults.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.ListContainersAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.ListContainersRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Returns all containers owned by the specified entity.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.UpdateContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.UpdateContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Updates mutable container properties like capacity limits and filtering.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.DeleteContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.DeleteContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Deletes a container. Must specify how to handle existing contents:
destroy, transfer to another container, or error if not empty.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.AddItemToContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.AddItemRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Adds an item instance to a container. Validates container constraints
(slots, weight, grid, category filters). For stackable items, may
merge with existing stacks.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.RemoveItemFromContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.RemoveItemRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Removes an item from its container. The item still exists but has no
container assignment. Use destroy via lib-item to permanently delete.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.MoveItemAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.MoveItemRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Move item to different slot or container
member.remarks:
Moves an item within the same container (slot change) or to a different
container. Validates destination constraints. For equipment slots, this
effectively equips/unequips items.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.TransferItemAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.TransferItemRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Transfers an item to a container owned by a different entity.
Used for trades, gifts, and loot distribution.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.SplitStackAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.SplitStackRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Splits a stack of items into two stacks. The original stack keeps the
remainder, and a new stack is created with the split quantity.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.MergeStacksAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.MergeStacksRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Merges two stacks of the same item template. The source stack is
destroyed and its quantity added to the target stack.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.QueryItemsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.QueryItemsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Searches for items across all containers owned by an entity.
Can filter by template, category, tags, and other criteria.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.CountItemsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.CountItemsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Counts total quantity of a specific item template across containers.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.HasItemsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.HasItemsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if entity has required items

Checks if an entity has the required quantities of specified items.
Used for crafting and quest requirements validation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.FindSpaceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.FindSpaceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Finds available space for an item in the owner's containers.
Returns candidate containers and slots where the item could be placed.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.InventoryClient.CreateContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.CreateContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates a new container with the specified constraint model and capacity.
Container types are game-defined strings (e.g., "inventory", "bank", "equipment_slot").

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.InventoryClient.GetContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.GetContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Retrieves a container by ID, optionally including its contents.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.InventoryClient.GetOrCreateContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.GetOrCreateContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get container or create if not exists
member.remarks:
Enables lazy container creation for character inventories.
If a container doesn't exist for the owner/type combination, creates it
with the specified defaults.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.InventoryClient.ListContainersAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.ListContainersRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Returns all containers owned by the specified entity.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.InventoryClient.UpdateContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.UpdateContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Updates mutable container properties like capacity limits and filtering.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.InventoryClient.DeleteContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.DeleteContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Deletes a container. Must specify how to handle existing contents:
destroy, transfer to another container, or error if not empty.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.InventoryClient.AddItemToContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.AddItemRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Adds an item instance to a container. Validates container constraints
(slots, weight, grid, category filters). For stackable items, may
merge with existing stacks.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.InventoryClient.RemoveItemFromContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.RemoveItemRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Removes an item from its container. The item still exists but has no
container assignment. Use destroy via lib-item to permanently delete.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.InventoryClient.MoveItemAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.MoveItemRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Move item to different slot or container
member.remarks:
Moves an item within the same container (slot change) or to a different
container. Validates destination constraints. For equipment slots, this
effectively equips/unequips items.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.InventoryClient.TransferItemAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.TransferItemRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Transfers an item to a container owned by a different entity.
Used for trades, gifts, and loot distribution.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.InventoryClient.SplitStackAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.SplitStackRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Splits a stack of items into two stacks. The original stack keeps the
remainder, and a new stack is created with the split quantity.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.InventoryClient.MergeStacksAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.MergeStacksRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Merges two stacks of the same item template. The source stack is
destroyed and its quantity added to the target stack.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.InventoryClient.QueryItemsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.QueryItemsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Searches for items across all containers owned by an entity.
Can filter by template, category, tags, and other criteria.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.InventoryClient.CountItemsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.CountItemsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Counts total quantity of a specific item template across containers.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.InventoryClient.HasItemsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.HasItemsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if entity has required items
member.remarks:
Checks if an entity has the required quantities of specified items.
Used for crafting and quest requirements validation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.InventoryClient.FindSpaceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.FindSpaceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Finds available space for an item in the owner's containers.
Returns candidate containers and slots where the item could be placed.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Item service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.CreateItemTemplateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.CreateItemTemplateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates a new item definition for a game. Code, gameId, quantityModel, and scope
are immutable after creation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.GetItemTemplateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.GetItemTemplateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get item template by ID or code
member.remarks:
Retrieves an item template by its unique ID or by code+gameId combination.
At least one of templateId or (code + gameId) must be provided.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.ListItemTemplatesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ListItemTemplatesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Lists item templates with optional filtering by gameId, category, tags,
rarity, scope, and active status.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.UpdateItemTemplateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.UpdateItemTemplateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update mutable fields of an item template
member.remarks:
Updates mutable fields of an item template. Code, gameId, quantityModel, and scope
are immutable after creation and cannot be changed.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.DeprecateItemTemplateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.DeprecateItemTemplateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Marks an item template as deprecated. Deprecated templates cannot be used
to create new instances but existing instances remain valid. Optionally
specify a migration target template.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.CreateItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.CreateItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates a new item instance from a template. The instance must be placed
in a container (containerId required). Use lib-inventory's /inventory/add
for most use cases - this endpoint is for low-level instance creation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.GetItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.GetItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Retrieves an item instance by its unique ID.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.ModifyItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ModifyItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Modifies an item instance's mutable state: durability, custom stats,
custom name, and metadata. Cannot modify bound items unless admin.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.BindItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.BindItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Binds an item instance to a character. The bind type must be allowed by
the template's soulboundType. Once bound, the item cannot be traded.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.UnbindItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.UnbindItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Removes the binding from a soulbound item. This is an admin-only operation
for returning bound items to tradeable state. Requires a reason for audit trail.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.DestroyItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.DestroyItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Permanently destroys an item instance. The reason is recorded for audit.
Cannot destroy bound items unless admin or reason is 'admin'.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.ListItemsByContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ListItemsByContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Returns all item instances in the specified container.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.ListItemsByTemplateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ListItemsByTemplateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Returns item instances of the specified template, optionally filtered by realm.
Useful for admin queries and analytics.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.BatchGetItemInstancesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.BatchGetItemInstancesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get multiple item instances by ID
member.remarks: Retrieves multiple item instances in a single request.

Useful for getting all cities in a region, all buildings in a city, etc.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.ListRootLocationsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ListRootLocationsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get root locations in a realm
member.remarks:
Returns all top-level locations in a realm (locations with no parent).
These are typically regions or major areas within the realm.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.GetLocationAncestorsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.GetLocationAncestorsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get all ancestors of a location
member.remarks:
Returns the full ancestry chain from the specified location up to the
root location (parentLocationId=null). For example, for a specific building
might return [district, city, region].

member.remarks:

(direct children, grandchildren, etc.). Useful for finding all places
within a region or city.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.SetLocationParentAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.SetLocationParentRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Set or change the parent of a location
member.remarks:
Update a location's parent, moving it in the hierarchy.
Validates that:
- New parent exists and is in the same realm
- No circular reference would be created
- Updates depth for location and all descendants

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.RemoveLocationParentAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.RemoveLocationParentRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Remove parent from a location (make it a root location)
member.remarks:
Remove the parent of a location, making it a top-level root location
within its realm. Updates depth for location and all descendants.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.DeleteLocationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.DeleteLocationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Hard delete a location. This will fail if the location:
- Has child locations (must delete or reparent children first)
- Is still referenced by other entities
For safe removal, first deprecate the location, remove all children,
then delete.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.DeprecateLocationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.DeprecateLocationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Soft-delete a location by marking it as deprecated.
Deprecated locations:
- Remain queryable for historical data
- Cannot be used for placing new entities
- Can be hard-deleted after all references are removed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.UndeprecateLocationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.UndeprecateLocationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Remove the deprecated status from a location, making it
available for entity placement again.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.LocationExistsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.LocationExistsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if location exists and is active
member.remarks:
Fast validation endpoint for other services to check location validity.
Returns true if location exists and is not deprecated, false otherwise.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.SeedLocationsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.SeedLocationsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Idempotent operation to seed locations from provided data.
Creates locations that don't exist, optionally updates existing locations.
Processes locations in dependency order (parents before children).
Typically called at service startup with YAML-defined location hierarchies.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Mapping service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.CreateChannelAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.CreateChannelRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create a new map channel and become its authority
member.remarks:
Creates a new region+kind channel and grants authority to caller.
Returns ingestTopic for high-throughput event publishing.
If channel already exists with active authority, returns Conflict.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.ReleaseAuthorityAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.ReleaseAuthorityRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Voluntarily releases authority. Channel becomes unassigned.
Only the current authority can release.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.AuthorityHeartbeatAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.AuthorityHeartbeatRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Keep-alive for authority. Must be called periodically (default every 30s).
Failure to heartbeat results in authority expiration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.PublishMapUpdateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.PublishMapUpdateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Game servers use this to push authoritative spatial updates.
Validates authority token, stores update, and broadcasts to consumers.
For high-throughput scenarios, use event publishing via ingestTopic instead.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.PublishObjectChangesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.PublishObjectChangesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Game servers use this to push object state changes.
Efficiently batches multiple object changes into one event.
Max 100 changes per request.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.RequestSnapshotAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.RequestSnapshotRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Request full snapshot for cold start
member.remarks:
Consumers use this when starting up to get initial state.
Returns current snapshot of requested region/kinds.
For very large maps, payloadRef points to lib-asset storage.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.QueryPointAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.QueryPointRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Query map data at a specific point
member.remarks:
Returns all map data at a point across requested kinds.
Used by behavior stacks for contextual decisions.
Optionally includes objects within radius.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.QueryBoundsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.QueryBoundsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Returns map data within a bounding box.
For event actors needing region overview.
Limited to maxObjects per kind.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.QueryObjectsByTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.QueryObjectsByTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Find all objects of a type in region
member.remarks:
Returns all objects matching an objectType filter.
For event actors asking "where are all the boulder clusters?"

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.QueryAffordanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.AffordanceQueryRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Find locations that afford a specific action or scene type
member.remarks:
Affordance queries answer "where can I do X?" by combining
multiple map kinds and applying game-specific scoring logic.
Used by Event Brain for procedural scene orchestration:
- "Find ambush locations"
- "Find dramatic reveal spots"
- "Find sheltered rest areas"
Well-known types have predefined scoring; use affordanceType=custom
with customAffordance for novel scenarios.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.MappingClient.CreateChannelAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.CreateChannelRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create a new map channel and become its authority
member.remarks:
Creates a new region+kind channel and grants authority to caller.
Returns ingestTopic for high-throughput event publishing.
If channel already exists with active authority, returns Conflict.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.MappingClient.ReleaseAuthorityAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.ReleaseAuthorityRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Voluntarily releases authority. Channel becomes unassigned.
Only the current authority can release.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.MappingClient.AuthorityHeartbeatAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.AuthorityHeartbeatRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Keep-alive for authority. Must be called periodically (default every 30s).
Failure to heartbeat results in authority expiration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.MappingClient.PublishMapUpdateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.PublishMapUpdateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Game servers use this to push authoritative spatial updates.
Validates authority token, stores update, and broadcasts to consumers.
For high-throughput scenarios, use event publishing via ingestTopic instead.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.MappingClient.PublishObjectChangesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.PublishObjectChangesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Game servers use this to push object state changes.
Efficiently batches multiple object changes into one event.
Max 100 changes per request.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.MappingClient.RequestSnapshotAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.RequestSnapshotRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Request full snapshot for cold start
member.remarks:
Consumers use this when starting up to get initial state.
Returns current snapshot of requested region/kinds.
For very large maps, payloadRef points to lib-asset storage.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.MappingClient.QueryPointAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.QueryPointRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Query map data at a specific point
member.remarks:
Returns all map data at a point across requested kinds.
Used by behavior stacks for contextual decisions.
Optionally includes objects within radius.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.MappingClient.QueryBoundsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.QueryBoundsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Returns map data within a bounding box.
For event actors needing region overview.
Limited to maxObjects per kind.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.MappingClient.QueryObjectsByTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.QueryObjectsByTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Find all objects of a type in region
member.remarks:
Returns all objects matching an objectType filter.
For event actors asking "where are all the boulder clusters?"

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.MappingClient.QueryAffordanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.AffordanceQueryRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Find locations that afford a specific action or scene type
member.remarks:
Affordance queries answer "where can I do X?" by combining
multiple map kinds and applying game-specific scoring logic.
Used by Event Brain for procedural scene orchestration:
- "Find ambush locations"
- "Find dramatic reveal spots"
- "Find sheltered rest areas"
Well-known types have predefined scoring; use affordanceType=custom
with customAffordance for novel scenarios.

member.summary: Client interface for the Matchmaking service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.IMatchmakingClient.ListQueuesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.ListQueuesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
List all available matchmaking queues that players can join.
Returns queue configuration details including skill settings.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.IMatchmakingClient.GetQueueAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.GetQueueRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Get detailed configuration for a specific matchmaking queue.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.IMatchmakingClient.CreateQueueAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.CreateQueueRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Create a new matchmaking queue with specified configuration.
Admin only. Queue configuration includes skill settings, party limits,
and exclusive group membership.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.IMatchmakingClient.UpdateQueueAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.UpdateQueueRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Update configuration of an existing matchmaking queue.
Admin only. Changes take effect for new tickets only.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.IMatchmakingClient.DeleteQueueAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.DeleteQueueRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Delete a matchmaking queue. Admin only.
Existing tickets in the queue will be cancelled with reason 'queue_disabled'.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.IMatchmakingClient.JoinMatchmakingAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.JoinMatchmakingRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Join a matchmaking queue with specified properties and query.
Creates a matchmaking ticket and begins searching for compatible players.
Returns immediately after ticket creation. Match results are delivered
via WebSocket push events.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.IMatchmakingClient.LeaveMatchmakingAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.LeaveMatchmakingRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Leave a matchmaking queue and cancel the ticket.
Only available when actively in a queue (shortcut/prebound).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.IMatchmakingClient.GetMatchmakingStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.GetMatchmakingStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Get current matchmaking status for the player's active ticket.
Only available when actively in a queue (shortcut/prebound).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.IMatchmakingClient.AcceptMatchAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.AcceptMatchRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Accept a match that has been formed. Only available when a match
is pending acceptance (shortcut/prebound after match formation).
All players must accept within the timeout for the match to start.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.IMatchmakingClient.DeclineMatchAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.DeclineMatchRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Decline a match that has been formed. Only available when a match
is pending acceptance (shortcut/prebound after match formation).
Declining cancels the match for all participants.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.IMatchmakingClient.GetMatchmakingStatsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Matchmaking.GetMatchmakingStatsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Get operational statistics for matchmaking queues.
Includes queue depths, average wait times, and match rates.

member.remarks:
Retrieves a style definition by ID or name. Styles define mode preferences,
interval rules, form templates, and genre-specific parameters.

modal interchange, and jazz voicings.

interval preferences, and rhythmic patterns from the specified style.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.RestartServiceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ServiceRestartRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Performs intelligent service restart based on health metrics.
Only restarts if truly necessary (e.g., 5+ minute degradation).
Supports optional environment variable updates during restart.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.ShouldRestartServiceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ShouldRestartServiceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Evaluates service health and determines if restart is necessary.
Restart logic:
- Healthy: No restart needed
- Degraded < 5 min: No restart needed
- Degraded > 5 min: Restart recommended
- Unavailable: Restart needed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetBackendsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ListBackendsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Detects which container orchestration backends are available on this system.
Returns availability status and capabilities for each backend.
**Priority Order** (for automatic selection):
1. Kubernetes - Full cluster orchestration with operators
2. Portainer - API abstraction over Compose/Swarm with web UI
3. Docker Swarm - Native Docker cluster orchestration
4. Docker Compose - Single-host container management
Detection methods:
- Kubernetes: Check for kubectl and cluster connectivity
- Portainer: Check for Portainer API endpoint
- Swarm: Check `docker info` for swarm mode
- Compose: Check for docker compose v2 availability

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetPresetsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ListPresetsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Returns all available deployment presets from the orchestrator's preset directory.
Presets define service combinations and configuration for specific use cases.
Built-in presets:
- `local-development`: All services in single container with mesh infrastructure
- `local-testing`: Test environment with infrastructure services
- `integration-http`: HTTP integration testing preset
- `integration-edge`: WebSocket/edge testing preset
- `split-auth-account`: Auth and Account in separate containers
- `distributed-npc`: NPC processing distributed across nodes

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.DeployAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.DeployRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Deploys a complete environment using a preset or custom configuration.
Supports graceful transitions, forced deployments, and clean rebuilds.
**Deployment Modes**:
- `graceful`: Wait for existing connections to drain before changing topology
- `force`: Immediately apply changes (may interrupt active connections)
- `clean`: Tear down completely and rebuild from scratch
**Backend Selection**:
- If `backend` not specified, uses highest-priority available backend
- If `backend` specified but unavailable, returns error (no fallback)
**Live Topology Changes**:
Supports changing service distribution without full restart:
- Move auth/account to separate container while keeping other services together
- Scale specific services to additional nodes
- Update environment variables without restart (where supported)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetServiceRoutingAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetServiceRoutingRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Returns the current service-to-app-id routing mappings used for mesh service invocation through lib-mesh.
This is the authoritative source of truth for how services are routed in the current deployment.
In development, all services route to "bannou" by default. In production, services may be
distributed across multiple app-ids based on deployment topology.
**Use Cases**:
- Services querying routing on startup
- Debugging service communication issues
- Monitoring deployment topology

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Returns comprehensive status of the current deployment including:
- Active backend and deployment configuration
- Service topology (which services on which containers)
- Container health and resource usage
- Infrastructure component status
- Active preset and any customizations

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.TeardownAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Tears down all containers and services in the current deployment.
Optionally preserves volumes and networks for faster redeployment.
**Teardown Modes**:
- `graceful`: Signal shutdown and wait for clean exit
- `force`: Immediately stop all containers (SIGKILL)
- `preserve-data`: Keep volumes and networks, only remove containers

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.CleanAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.CleanRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Prunes unused Docker resources to reclaim disk space and clean up
orphaned containers, networks, volumes, and images.
Equivalent to running various `docker system prune` commands.
**Clean Targets**:
- `containers`: Remove stopped containers
- `networks`: Remove unused networks
- `volumes`: Remove unused volumes (CAUTION: data loss)
- `images`: Remove dangling images
- `all`: All of the above

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetLogsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetLogsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Retrieves logs from services or containers with filtering options.
Supports real-time streaming via WebSocket upgrade.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.UpdateTopologyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TopologyUpdateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update service topology without full redeploy
member.remarks:
Changes which services run on which containers without tearing down
the entire environment. Enables live topology changes.
**Use Cases**:
- Move auth service to dedicated container for scaling
- Consolidate services during low-traffic periods
- Split services for debugging/isolation
- Add new service nodes to running environment

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.RequestContainerRestartAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ContainerRestartRequestBody,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Plugins call this endpoint to request restart of their own container.
This is part of the self-service configuration update pattern where
plugins decide if they care about config changes and request restarts.
**Flow**:
1. Orchestrator publishes ConfigurationChangedEvent with changed keys
2. Plugins check if any changed keys match their dependencies
3. Plugins that care call this endpoint to request restart
4. Orchestrator performs rolling restart of requested containers
**Priority Levels**:
- `graceful`: Rolling update, wait for healthy before cycling next instance
- `immediate`: Rolling update but don't wait for connection drain
- `force`: Kill all instances simultaneously (causes downtime)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetContainerStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetContainerStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get container health and restart history
member.remarks:
Returns detailed status of a container including health, restart history,
running plugins, and current configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.RollbackConfigurationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigRollbackRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Quickly rollback to the previous configuration without waiting for CI.
Swaps currentConfig with previousConfig and publishes ConfigurationChangedEvent
with the reverted keys so services can request restart.
**Note**: This is a quick fix. GitHub secrets should still be corrected
to prevent re-breaking on next orchestrator deploy.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetConfigVersionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetConfigVersionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get current configuration version and metadata
member.remarks:
Returns the current configuration version, last update time,
and summary of configuration state (not actual values for security).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.AcquireProcessorAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.AcquireProcessorRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Acquire a processor from a pool
member.remarks:
Requests an available processor instance from the specified pool type.
Returns the app-id of an available processor or 429 if none available.
The processor is marked as busy until explicitly released.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.ReleaseProcessorAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ReleaseProcessorRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Release a processor back to the pool
member.remarks:
Releases a previously acquired processor, making it available for other requests.
Should be called when processing is complete or on error cleanup.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetPoolStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetPoolStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Returns current status of a processing pool including:
- Total instances (running and available)
- Current utilization
- Queue depth (waiting requests)
- Recent processing metrics

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.ScalePoolAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ScalePoolRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Manually adjust the size of a processing pool.
Can scale up (add instances) or scale down (remove idle instances).
Respects min/max constraints from pool configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.CleanupPoolAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.CleanupPoolRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Scales pool back to minimum instances by removing idle processors.
Used for resource reclamation during low-activity periods.
